    • Method Detail

      • getTarget

        public Target getTarget(java.lang.String props)
                 throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Instantiates a TargetRolloverFile object.
        Specified by:
        getTarget in class TargetFactory
        Parameters:
        props - Must contain a log file name and / or a max size for the file.
        .properties file structure: TargetRolloverFileFactory.params = "[name]";[size]
        The order of the parameters is important. If no name is specified, leave the semicolon (;[size]).
        Returns:
        An instance of a TargetRolloverFile object, constructed with the proper parameter(s).
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - If the given parameter is empty.

      • getTarget

        public Target getTarget()
                 throws InvalidConfigurationException
        Instantiates a TargetRolloverFile object.
        Specified by:
        getTarget in class TargetFactory
        Returns:
        An instance of a default TargetRolloverFile object.
        Throws:
        InvalidConfigurationException - Exception thrown when the given configuration is invalid.
